document.full_text: british-born claude choules, 110, believed to be the last world war one combat veteran, died in his sleep in an australian nursing home overnight, his family said on thursday.
document.title: last wwi combat vet claude choules dies aged 110
lines_and_colors: british-born claude choules, 110, believed to be the last world war one combat veteran, died in his sleep in an australian nursing home overnight, his family said on thursday.
